actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend US code, to restrict contracts for services relating to the positions of guards, elevator operators, messengers, and custodians.

summary.text: Provides that an executive agency may not enter into any contract to provide services to an executive agency relating to a position of guard, elevator operator, messenger, or custodian unless the Civil Service Commission certifies that there are no qualified applicants available for appointment to that position. (Adds 5 U.S.C. 3111)

titles.title: A bill to amend US code, to restrict contracts for services relating to the positions of guards, elevator operators, messengers, and custodians.
